"Etoile Class Aptitude Test IV":
"This is a test to judge whether an ARKS
is suitable for the Etoile class. This will
allow you to bypass the ability restriction.
This quest is for those who desire further
improvement of their skills and abilities.
※Etoile class only. Lv.61+ enemies.
Defeat [Snow Banther] using a D. Saber
Defeat [Dragon Ex] using Dual Blades
Defeat [Big Vardha] using a Wand
※Etoile's level cap increases to 100."

"Etoile Level Cap License IV~V
Advanced Etoile License I"
